doc.title: American Blood
doc.plot: American Blood is an exhaustive investigation of the greatest medical failure of modern times: the preventable contamination of the American blood supply with the hepatitis C virus (HCV) and HIV/AIDS, the subsequent exporting of contaminated blood products, and the resulting ruin that continues to ripple across the globe. With an emphasis on historic fact and utilizing key interviews and documents, the documentary hopes to inform all those who may be suffering, either knowingly or unknowingly, from liver failure associated with the hepatitis C virus.
